snippet.title: Trine: Ultimate Collection - Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience Trine 4 and the complete Trine series with Trine: Ultimate Collection for Switch this Fall! Pre-order now: https://www.trine4.com/?utm_campaign=devdiary2&utm_source=modus&utm_medium=youtube&utm_content=description#store


The Trine: Ultimate Collection is coming to Nintendo Switch with all four titles in the best-selling Trine series including Trine Enchanted Edition, Trine 2: Complete Story, Trine 3: Artifacts of Power and the all new Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince.  

The Trine series returns to the magic of 2.5D with Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince this fall! The three heroes of the best-selling adventure series are back, sent on a quest to retrieve the troubled young Prince Selius. Amadeus the Wizard, Pontius the Knight, and Zoya the Thief are joined together once again on a thrilling quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes teeming with danger.

Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/modusgames 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/modus_games 
Join our Discord: https://modus.games/discord
